title: Definitions
context: [PART XXXIII.] INDOOR AIR QUALITY Cross References Noise, radiation, and indoor air quality special fund; established, see ยง342P-7. [ยง321-411] Definitions. As used in this part: &ldquo;Department&rdquo; means the department of health. &ldquo;Director&rdquo; means the director of health. &ldquo;Publicly owned building&rdquo; means any building or structure, including a hospital or a school, that is owned, leased, or operated by the State; provided that it shall be a building or structure in which individuals employed by the State work during normal operations. [L 1994, c 234, pt of ยง2]
